api/BOOSETests.AppDrawToTests.html.title: Class AppDrawToTests | mysite
api/BOOSETests.AppDrawToTests.html.summary: Class AppDrawToTests Namespace BOOSETests Assembly BOOSETests.dll Unit tests for the AppCanvas DrawTo method. Verifies that drawing updates positions correctly and handles invalid coordinates. [TestClass] public class AppDrawToTests Inheritance object AppDrawToTests Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods DrawToShouldThrowOutOfRange() Tests that DrawTo(int, int) throws an ArgumentOutOfRangeException when coordinates exceed the canvas size. [TestMethod] public void DrawToShouldThrowOutOfRange() DrawToUpdatePosition() [TestMethod] public void DrawToUpdatePosition() DrawTo_NegativeCoordinates_ShouldThrow() Tests that DrawTo(int, int) throws an ArgumentOutOfRangeException when negative coordinates are provided. [TestMethod] public void DrawTo_NegativeCoordinates_ShouldThrow() Setup() Sets up a new AppCanvas instance before each test. Initializes the starting position to (50, 50). [TestInitialize] public void Setup()

api/BOOSETests.AppMoveToTests.html.title: Class AppMoveToTests | mysite
api/BOOSETests.AppMoveToTests.html.summary: Class AppMoveToTests Namespace BOOSETests Assembly BOOSETests.dll Unit tests for the AppCanvas MoveTo method. Verifies that moving the canvas updates positions and handles invalid coordinates. [TestClass] public class AppMoveToTests Inheritance object AppMoveToTests Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Methods MoveToShouldSetPositionToOrigin() Tests that MoveTo(int, int) sets the position to the origin (0,0). [TestMethod] public void MoveToShouldSetPositionToOrigin() MoveToShouldThrowInvalidPosition() Tests that MoveTo(int, int) throws an ArgumentOutOfRangeException with negative coordinates. [TestMethod] [ExpectedException(typeof(ArgumentOutOfRangeException))] public void MoveToShouldThrowInvalidPosition() MoveToShouldUpdatePosition() Tests that MoveTo(int, int) updates the X and Y positions. [TestMethod] public void MoveToShouldUpdatePosition() Setup() Initializes a new AppCanvas instance before each test. [TestInitialize] public void Setup()

api/BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | mysite
api/BOOSEapp.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int) Creates a new canvas with a set width and height. public AppCanvas(int width, int height) Parameters width int Canvas width in pixels. height int Canvas height in pixels. Fields xpos public int xpos Field Value int ypos public int ypos Field Value int Properties PenColour Gets or sets the current colour of the pen. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Gets or sets the current X position of the pen. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Gets or sets the current X position of the pen. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle using the current pen position as the centre. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int Circle radius. filled bool Whether to fill the circle. Clear() Clears the entire canvas back to white. public void Clear() DrawError(string) Draws an error message at the top of the canvas. Overwrites previous error area. public void DrawError(string message) Parameters message string The message to display. DrawMessage(string) Draws a text message on the canvas (top-left). public void DrawMessage(string message) Parameters message string The message to draw. DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current pen position to a new point. Updates the pen location afterwards. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int Destination X coordinate. y int Destination Y coordinate. Exceptions ArgumentOutOfRangeException MoveTo(int, int) Moves the pen to a position. Throws an error if the position is outside the canvas. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int Target X position. y int Target Y position. Exceptions ArgumentOutOfRangeException Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle starting at the pen position. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int Rectangle width. height int Rectangle height. filled bool Whether the rectangle is filled. Reset() Resets the pen position and colour. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Placeholder: changes canvas size (not implemented). public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int height int SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the pen colour using RGB values. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int Red value 0-255. green int Green value 0-255. blue int Blue value 0-255. Tri(int, int) Placeholder: draws a triangle (not implemented). public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int height int WriteText(string) public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string getBitmap() Gets the bitmap used for drawing output. public object getBitmap() Returns object The drawing bitmap.

api/BOOSEapp.AppCircle.html.title: Class AppCircle | mysite
api/BOOSEapp.AppCircle.html.summary: Class AppCircle Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll A command that draws a circle on the canvas. public class AppCircle : CommandOneParameter, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter AppCircle Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Remarks This command expects exactly one parameter: radius - the radius of the circle it draws. The command validates the parameter and throws a BOOSE.CommandException if the radius is missing or invalid. Constructors AppCircle() Initializes a new instance of the AppCircle class. public AppCircle() Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Checks and stores the parameters for the circle command. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] The list of parameters passed to the command. Exceptions CommandException Thrown when the number of parameters is not exactly one. Execute() Executes the circle drawing command. public override void Execute() Exceptions CommandException Thrown when the radius parameter is missing or less than or equal to zero.

api/BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory.html.title: Class AppCommandFactory | mysite
api/BOOSEapp.AppCommandFactory.html.summary: Class AppCommandFactory Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll A new factory class for creating custom application commands. public class AppCommandFactory : CommandFactory, ICommandFactory Inheritance object CommandFactory AppCommandFactory Implements ICommandFactory Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Remarks This factory extends the base BOOSE.CommandFactory and makes commands like: circle → AppCircle rect → AppRect moveto → AppMoveTo Any command not handled here is passed to the original BOOSE command factory via MakeCommand(string). Methods MakeCommand(string) Creates a command instance based on the command keyword. public override ICommand MakeCommand(string commandType) Parameters commandType string The name of the command entered by the user. Returns ICommand Returns an instance of a command implementing BOOSE.ICommand. Returns custom application commands when recognized, otherwise defers to the base factory. Exceptions FactoryException

api/BOOSEapp.AppMoveTo.html.title: Class AppMoveTo | mysite
api/BOOSEapp.AppMoveTo.html.summary: Class AppMoveTo Namespace BOOSEapp Assembly BOOSEapp.dll shows the moveto command which moves the canvas cursor to a new (x, y) position. public class AppMoveTo : CommandTwoParameters, ICommand Inheritance object Command CanvasCommand CommandOneParameter CommandTwoParameters AppMoveTo Implements ICommand Inherited Members CommandTwoParameters.param2 CommandTwoParameters.param2unprocessed CommandOneParameter.param1 CommandOneParameter.param1unprocessed CanvasCommand.yPos CanvasCommand.xPos CanvasCommand.canvas CanvasCommand.Canvas Command.IsDouble Command.program Command.parameterList Command.parameters Command.paramsint Command.Set(StoredProgram, string) Command.Compile() Command.ProcessParameters(string) Command.ToString() Command.Program Command.Name Command.ParameterList Command.Parameters Command.Paramsint object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) Remarks This command uses two parameters: X coordinate Y coordinate The coordinates must be positive; or BOOSE.CommandException is thrown. Methods CheckParameters(string[]) Validates the parameters of the command. public override void CheckParameters(string[] parameterList) Parameters parameterList string[] The list of parameters from the user input. Exceptions CommandException Thrown when the command doesnt contain two parameters. Execute() Executes the MoveTo command after validating parameters. public override void Execute() Exceptions CommandException Thrown when: Exactly two parameters are not provided. Coordinates are negative.

Exceptions CommandException Thrown when the number of parameters is not exactly two. Execute() Executes the Rect command after validating parameters. public override void Execute() Exceptions CommandException Thrown when: Parameters are missing or not two values. AppMoveTo shows the moveto command which moves the canvas cursor to a new (x, y) position. AppRect This command draws a rectangle on the canvas using width and height in pixels. Form1
